Name: Max
Text: Slippery Slide: Play this card to make all opponents' penguins slip and slide, causing them to shuffle to random players.

Name: Rob
Text: Penguin Parade: Swap one of your penguins with another player's penguin, but only if you both do a silly penguin dance together!

Name: Danny
Text: Fish Frenzy: All penguins go crazy for fish! Players must shout "Fish!" and grab the nearest card before it gets stolen.

Name: Evan
Text: Penguin Teleport: Send a penguin on a magical journey to another player's collection. Abracadabra, it's theirs now!

Name: Thalorin
Text: Dragon’s Roar: Unleash a mighty roar to force all opponents to discard their highest attack card.

Name: Elyndra
Text: Mystic Veil: Prevent the next attack against you by shrouding your penguins in magical mist.

Name: Bramblethorn
Text: Forest’s Embrace: All players must swap one card with the player to their left as the enchanted woods shift.

Name: Sir Galdric
Text: Knight’s Valor: Double your defense for one round as your penguin dons shining armor.

Name: Morgwyn
Text: Shadow Bind: Choose an opponent; they cannot play action cards on their next turn.
